thread.title: Nadirshah plans Amar Akbar Anthony remake
thread.title_full: Nadirshah plans Amar Akbar Anthony remake - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Nadirshah plans Amar Akbar Anthony remake
text:
Nadirshah's debut directorial Amar Akbar Anthony opened to rave reviews and packed theatres in Kerala. The director is now planning a Tamil remake of the movie to go on floors next year.
The cast of the film is yet to be confirmed. The Malayalam movie had Prithviraj, Indrajith and Jayasurya in the lead with Namitha Pramod and Ramesh Pisharody in supporting roles.
Nadirshah also revealed that his next movie will have Dileep in the lead. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
